comment_PHENOTYPE_TABLE_FILE: Contains the list of strains and their experimental data.
comment_SOURCE_DATABASE_DIR: Contains the target proteome databases. File names are '*.faa.gz'.
comment_TEMP_PROTEOMICS_IN_TABLE_DIR: Symbolic links to target proteome databases are created here.
comment_CONCATENATED_PROTEOMES_FILE: Concatenated proteomes of all tested strains
(no duplicate IDs). Used as jackhmmer db.
comment_DOMTBLOUT_FILE: Contains domain hits of the target strain proteins.
